body_html:
Hi, I'm getting the same error.

tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:427] could not set cudnn tensor descriptor: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM

I'm using 3D convolutions as well like @vguizilini . Also, the current documentation says cudnn 5.1 is supported.

body:
Hi, I'm getting the same error.
```
tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:427] could not set cudnn tensor descriptor: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM
```
I'm using 3D convolutions as well like @vguizilini . Also, the current documentation says cudnn 5.1 is supported.
